titles.title: A bill for the relief of Guy Vang, Genevieve Chong Foung, Caroline Vang, and Meline "Melanie" Vang.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/3/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Guy Vang, Genevieve Chong Foung, Caroline Vang, and Meline "Melanie" Vang.
